text:
Silvia Gaudino (born 14 December 1981) is an Italian rugby player. She plays third centre line at Monza.
She is a member of the Italy women's national rugby union team. She participated at the 2002 Women's Rugby World Cup, 2005 FIRA Women's European Championship, 2013 Six Nations Championship, 2015 Six Nations Championship, and 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup.
